Guiding you towards clarity and purpose.
I’m Tejashvini Batheja, a professional tarot reader with 6 years of experience helping people navigate life with clarity and confidence.

I view tarot as a tool for insight and self-reflection, guiding you to understand your present situation, recognize patterns, and explore options that align with your goals. My focus is on helping you connect with your intuition and make choices that support your personal growth and well-being.

ach session provides a safe, respectful, and confidential space where your experiences and concerns are honored. I offer guidance that is honest, compassionate, and empowering, designed to help you navigate challenges and make the most of every situation.
Whether you’re seeking perspective, direction, or clarity, I’m here to support your journey and help you move forward with confidence

Terms & Conditions for Tarot Reading Services
By booking a tarot reading session and proceeding with payment, you agree to the following:
Readings are honest and reflect the most probable outcomes based on the cards.
Your choices and actions influence outcomes; final results are your responsibility.
Tarot readings are for guidance and self-reflection only, not a substitute for medical, legal, or professional advice.
. Topics That Will Not Be Addressed
The following topics will not be predicted or discussed under any circumstances:
No refunds or reschedules are allowed if the client misses the session without notice.
By booking and paying, you confirm that you have read, understood, and agreed to these Terms & Conditions.
